headache.guidance: Mild headaches can be caused by stress, dehydration, or fatigue. Rest and hydration may help.
headache.escalation: If headache persists, worsens, or is accompanied by other symptoms, consider consulting a medical professional.

fever.guidance: A mild fever can occur due to infections or fatigue. Monitoring and rest may help.
fever.escalation: If fever is high or lasts multiple days, seek medical guidance.

stomach pain.guidance: Stomach discomfort can be related to diet, stress, or indigestion.
stomach pain.escalation: Persistent or severe pain should be evaluated by a healthcare professional.
